reference.shortdesc: The tt (teletype) indicates text that typically is rendered in monospaced highlighting.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The tt element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the tt element can be used to apply monospaced highlighting:
example.codeblock: Make sure that the screen displays File successfully created before proceeding to the next stage of the task.
example.p: While the example demonstrates a potential use of tt, use systemoutput if you have access to the elements in the software domain.
